articles.title: Su-27 Fighter Pilots That ‘Downed’ US MQ-9 Reaper Drone Nominated For State Awards: Moscow - EurAsian Times
articles.description: Russian Defense Minister Sergei Shoigu has nominated pilots of the Su-27 fighters for state awards who “prevented” a border violation by a US MQ-9 Reaper drone, the ministry said on Friday. “Minister of Defense of the Russian Federation, General of the Army S…
articles.content:
Russian Defense Minister Sergei Shoigu has nominated pilots of the Su-27 fighters for state awards who “prevented” a border violation by a US MQ-9 Reaper drone, the ministry said on Friday.
